name: KEKE Do You Love Balls? - Kiss
name_original: KEKE Do You Love Balls? - Kiss
description:
A unique combination of lovely visuals and elegant gameplay that draws you in more and more as you play.

KEKE Do You Love Balls is a simple yet fun game to play anytime, anywhere. Explore the perplexing maze and aim to reach your love ball. It’s not easy as you need to clear and pass all the booty traps that are setup throughout your journey.

You just need to tap to turn at right moment and crush through the smallest gap. The moving walls and sticks could be danger as well as unpredictable for you. It’s a great super challenge for you as well as tricky to keep up on the jam happening on your screen, but your concentration is desirably decisive if you are going to progress

This game features :
• Exciting gameplay that can prove to be unpredictable
• Top the leaderboard
• One tap gameplay
